short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts times measured in hours to runtimes of various TWIOAT films

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspired by The Worst Idea of All Time Podcast, this extensions converts the battery life of products for sale on Apple's website to their equivalent in movie runtimes. The movies selected are from The Worst Idea of All Time canon, in order to give fans context for how just how much time is spent on this silly little podcast.

Inspiration came directly from this episode of the podcast: https://shows.acast.com/worstideaofalltime/episodes/08-battery-life
